head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZACH, PHILIP C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZACH, PHILIP C.

block.p: ZACH-Philip C., of Mt. Vernon, New York, on July 1, 2000 in Cutler, Maine. Husband of Joanne Geraci Zach. Father of Owen Carl Zach. Brother of Adam F. Zach and Andrew F. Patterson. Son of the late Barbara Frost Patterson and the late Leo Zach. Step-son of Jack E. Patterson. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville, NY between the hours of 2-4 and 7-9 PM on Sunday. Service at the Huguenot Memorial Church, Pelham, NY on Monday, July 10 at 10:30 AM. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to the Sarah Lawrence Early Childhood Center, 1 Mead Way, Bronxville, New York 10708.

In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to the Sarah Lawrence Early Childhood Center, 1 Mead Way, Bronxville, New York 10708.
